name: Velkynvelve Trouble (1d8)
description: Small complications and living-world beats inside Velkynvelve.

results.text: A quaggoth starts snarling and pacing. Guards tighten chains and watch the pens.
A drow acolyte marks a post with ichor. The air feels colder for a moment.
A prisoner collapses from exhaustion. A guard threatens punishment if anyone moves.
Jorlan delays a patrol with ‘inspection’. You gain a short window nearby.
A faint spore haze drifts through the pen. Stool looks anxious but quiet.
A torch sputters low. Shadows deepen; stealth becomes easier for a moment.
Bridge webbing creaks loudly. Anyone crossing must slow down or risk noise.
Ilvara appears and speaks a quiet threat. Fear spikes; mistakes become likely.

name: Guard Patrol Beat (1d6)
description: Roll to move patrols and keep the outpost feeling alive.

results.text: Two drow cross a bridge and scan the cavern below.
A lone elite pauses to check a rope line; their back is turned briefly.
A guard counts prisoners at the pen, then moves on.
A patrol gathers at the guard tower, leaving another area under-watched.
A handler drags a quaggoth past. The handler is distracted and vulnerable.
Jorlan reassigns someone; patrol timing shifts for a few minutes.

name: Escape Hazard (1d10)
description: Use when crossing bridges, climbing, using the waterfall route, or racing the alarm.

results.text: A board/web strand snaps. A loud crack echoes—raise suspicion.
Loose rock skitters into the chasm. A guard looks over the edge.
A rope line is frayed—movement is slower here unless stabilized.
Torch smoke betrays position. Anyone with flame must cover/snub it.
A gust sways the bridge. Aim and footing are harder for a moment.
Sticky webbing grabs boots—someone loses momentum or makes noise.
Water-slick stone near the pool. A slip causes a loud splash.
A distant shout—another patrol converges toward the sound.
A quaggoth roars and strains at chains; chaos may erupt nearby.
Lantern light sweeps the route. Freeze or hide—or trigger a chase.

name: Pursuit Escalation (1d6)
description: Roll once the escape is confirmed to add pressure in a fair, escalating way.

results.text: Whistles echo. Two guards move to chokepoints.
An elite takes a ranged position to slow the escapees.
Quaggoths are released; they rush toward noise and blood.
Ilvara arrives at a vantage point and begins directing the hunt.
A quick net/web trap goes up across a likely route.
Full lockdown: doors barred, patrols doubled, lights relit.
